mean_cn: n. 愤世嫉俗者，犬儒学派的人；  adj. 犬儒学派的
mean_en: a person who has negative opinions about other people and about the things people do
word_etyma: cyn狗+ic...的→象狗一样活着的人 → 犬儒主义者
sentence: My mother is a bit of a cynic--she never thinks any good will come from anything.
sentence_trans: 我妈妈有点愤世嫉俗，她从不认为什么好事会发生。
